newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT-Peoles upped to buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-Peoles upped to buy.

text.p: -- Credit Lyonnais Securities upgraded Mexican mining giant Industrias Penoles, the world's largest refined silver producer, to a buy from a hold despite lowering its earnings estimates for the company.
-- Analyst David Bodenberg said recent weakness in the share price more than adequately discounts the eroded earnings outlook.
-- He lowered the company's 1996 earnings estimate to 2.53 pesos from 2.80 pesos and its 1997 estimate to 3.25 pesos from 3.50 pesos, due mostly a recent fall in gold and silver prices.
